title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When the user selects a file in the Navigator and chooses 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' when the file is already open in the Scripted Resource Editor example, nothing happens. The Scripted Resource Editor example is still the active editor.
EB: When the user selects a file in the Navigator and chooses 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' when the file is already open in the Scripted Resource Editor example, a new editor should open for the file using the Default Text Editor. The Scripted Resource Editor example should no longer be the active editor.
SR:
Reproduce the steps to replicate the issue: 1. Open the Scripted Resource Editor example. 2. Create a new basic project. 3. Create a new XML file named 'test.xml'. 4. With the 'test.xml' file selected in the Navigator, choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'. 5. Verify that nothing happens and the Scripted Resource Editor example is still the active editor. 

The expected result is that a new editor with the Default Text Editor should open for the 'test.xml' file, and the Scripted Resource Editor example should no longer be the active editor. 

NOTES: Searching for an existing open file should also consider the editor types.
